case_title: Messrs AL BASHIR COLD STORAGE vs COMMISSIONER (APPEALS) PRA, LAHORE

facts.registration_status: Compulsory registration for providing 'cold storage' service listed at Sr. No. 61 of the 2nd Schedule of Punjab Sales Tax on Services Act, 2012

legal_provisions.primary_act: Punjab Sales Tax on Services Act, 2012
rules_cited: Punjab Sales Tax on Services (Adjudication and Appeals) Rules, 2015
Punjab Sales Tax on Services (Registration and De-registration) Rules, 2012

key_findings.mens_rea: No mens rea found for non-registration as appellant registered before receiving show-cause notice.
key_findings.penalty_nature: Penalty proceedings are criminal in nature and require proof of willful evasion of tax.
key_findings.principles_violated: Natural justice, fairness, reasonableness, and neutrality were not strictly observed in adjudication proceedings.

orders_set_aside: Order dated 02.05.2018 of Enforcement Officer, Enforcement Unit-4
Order dated 24.09.2018 of Commissioner (Appeals) PRA Lahore
